summary:
Pocket Protectors are miniature guardians that you can carry around in your inventory. Drop them, and they fight for you!
To use a Pocket Protector, go into your inventory and drop their item. They will appear in game, and start fighting for you. When you are ready to move on, or they die, just pick them back up again!
descriptionHtml:
Pocket Protectors are miniature guardians that you can carry around in your inventory. Drop them, and they fight for you!
To use a Pocket Protector, go into your inventory and drop their item. They will appear in game, and start fighting for you. When you are ready to move on, or they die, just pick them back up again!

The Five current Pocket Protectors are:
-The Dwemer Sphere is located in a barrel in the first area of Nchuand Zel, just go through Markarth\'s Understone Keep
-The Dremora is located in a barrel in Hag\'s End
-The Flame Atronach is located in a knapsack in Sinderon\'s Outpost in Blackreach
-The Sabre Cat is located in a barrel of Riverwood
-The Frost Troll is located in the exterior of Labyrinthian, you must kill the troll carrying it.
See the pictures for the exact locations.

These five are only the first many. Future updates will include new Pocket Protectors, and new ways to aquire them.

If you like my mod, please endorse it, and try out my Quest Mod, which adds a new dungeon, 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15896]The Dead Bee Scrolls[/url]
author: Jim Lawrence
